TopicTitle: To speak in a fashion similar to an upper-class person of british origin

Articles.Content:
I must say, speaking in such a fashion is quite enjoyable.

Though I am quite inclined to think this may all have started as sort of good-natured jibe against us upper-class Brits, eh?
Good show, old chaps! I must say, this thread is quite exquisite!

> 
> Racists

Excuse me, sir? Are you accusing us of being unfair to other people based on our fashion of speaking? How insulting! I demand apologies!
As do I, because of the green Iron crown incident.
Why, nobody wants to speak of that dreadful occurrence. Let us talk of more trivial matters.
Ah, but you see, the news reporters are causing such a dreadful racket outside, demanding the return of Green Iron Crown!

Pip pip cherrio old chap. Oi some tea and crumpets with the queen. Bloody fish n' chips, some crisps and barbeque roast. MI6 Mr. Bond.

Oi.

I havent have the slightest idea wot you're on about good sir, and I give you my apologies. Yeah about this GIC sport...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-12T21:41:43Z" title="03/12/2015 09:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 12, 2015</time> by CelticCossack51**
I doo think we ought to give him a return because we ought to let some newer people join, right chaps?

Good heavens! Such a bloody matter has been concluded quite maturely that his return is one that has no such valid discussion for us forum gentlemen. Let us return to our previous discussions now, shall we?

Of course, Mr. Columbia

(Being American really puts a strain on accents lol)

> 
> 
> On March 6, 2015 at 1:18 AM, jake9039 said:
> 
> 
> As do I, because of the green Iron crown incident.
> 

I do say, what is this incident you speak of? And who is this Green Iron Crown fellow?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-25T23:28:39Z" title="03/25/2016 11:28  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 25, 2016</time> by astrokerb**

My dear Astrokerb, I have heard the story of Green Iron Crown, and so I shall say what I heard, in the hopes that the story shall not go unheeded.

Twas a long time ago, when the forums were but a wee bit of text, with oh, so few accounts upon them. Twas a time before even I was anything more than a byte, floating through the cyberæther. Twas a time when reputation was implemented only very recently, and there were hitherto many unknowns in the whole process.

(sips tea)

But the moderators, the omniscient, overseeing moderators, were there, and thus made it their mission to find if reputation could be made negative.

And so, the account of Green Iron Crown was born, as nothing more than a Test. A Test of reputation, of integers, and of likes.

But Green Iron Crown did not go unnoticed. A member of this very forum gave Green Iron Crown a *like*! Soon, a game was made out of giving Green Iron Crown likes and dislikes, pitting moderator against forum member, in a race to see Green Iron Crown's total reputation!

(dramatic tea sipping)

In the end, the mighty moderators prevailed! They had proven that reputation  *could*  be made negative! And, his purpose fulfilled, Green Iron Crown was deleted.

That is the story of Green Iron Crown, as I have heard it said.

(By the way, this is all what I've read off of other threads. I wasn't actually there at the time, so if I goofed up a fact, feel free to correct me.)
I say, old chap, this is a jolly good thread!
